com.amonson.node_monitoring - package com.amonson.node_monitoring
A class implementation that allows a cluster (one per node) of applications to monitor each other and send one-way messages to nodes in the cluster from other processes on nodes in the cluster (localhost access only using the included client called NodeMonitoringClient).
com.amonson.prop_store - package com.amonson.prop_store
An implementation of parsing/generating structured information like JSON or YAML.
